release.change: FeedPusher (beta): Easily add feeds to Holo Reader from your desktop computer, just activate it from the menu.
Feed discovery: Add feeds by just providing the website URL instead of the full feed URL (has to be supported by the website).
Prevent crash when resuming activity while feeds are refreshing (Android 4.2 only).
Prevent crash when trying to add feeds.
Prevent crash due to malformed URL.
